message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for my budget. I'm interested, but I'd only be willing to pay $8,000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit of a stretch. How about we settle at $9,500? That's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9,500. I'm willing to compromise at $10,200
Alice, it seems like we're getting close. I'm willing to increase my offer to $9,800 to try and close this deal.
I'm glad to hear you're willing to increase your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000
